Reviews.Title: NO SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Timothy  K. Jones
Reviews.Content: Works ok when connected to TV. Wireless distance is more than 100 ft.Night vision is about 20 ftHowever when we attempted to connect a computer, for control and recording, it would not work.Tried 2 different computers and 2 cables and it would never make a connection.There is no website with support info or downloads.The vendor's reply was simply a list of computer requirements.

ProductInfo.Features:
Display on TV or PC, See and record 4 pictures circularly
Supports remote monitoring and controlling by 3rd party software via PC, supports Internet video telephone
Includes a 4-Channel Standalone DVR, 4 Infrared Waterproof Cameras and Video Cables
30 LEDs Per camera for up to 65 feet night vision (open area)
ProductInfo.Name: 2.4GHz Wireless Surveillance Camera Kit w/4-Channel Wireless USB DVR Receiver & 4 Wireless Motion Indoor/Outdoor Night Vision Color Cameras
